txt.en: Flowers That Fester

'Job well done! Caltha and her helpers will catch wind of what we've accomplished, but don't worry -- they may suspect my friends and me, but they won't suspect you at all.\n\n'We should do this again some other time! But one last thing: if anyone asks you, pretend we never met.'
Gather foul flowers from Vinca's basket
Carry the flowers to the tables ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Vinca is targeting two tables around the Party Tree, specifically the ones with empty vases.\n\nYou should place your flowers in the vases while avoiding Caltha's helpers.
DNT- You have \qdecorated\q a table
Report back to Vinca

'Job well done! Caltha and her helpers will eventually catch wind of what we've accomplished, but it'll be a sight to see when they do. And don't worry -- they may suspect my friends and me, but they won't suspect you at all.\n\n'We should do this again some other time! But one last thing: if anyone asks you, pretend we never met.'
The tables now have bouquets of smelly flowers thanks to your efforts.\n\nVinca will want to hear about your deed.
You have \qdecorated\q a table ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Carry the flowers to the tables
Report back to Vinca
Carry the flowers to the tables ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF0000>You must not be spotted by Caltha's helpers</rgb>
DNT - Pick up the flowers
Gather some foul flowers from Vinca's basket.\n\nVinca wants you to \qdecorate\q a couple of tables around the Party Tree with her flowers.

Vinca Pott wants to decorate tables at the Party Tree with smelly flowers, but she'll need some outside help to complete the job.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
dropped flowers
DNT - You have dropped the flowers and should return to Vinca
You have \qdecorated\q a table ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#FF0000>You've been spotted</rgb>
DNT - 'All you have to do is avoid Caltha and her helpers while you're placing our flowers in the vases. You wouldn't tell on us, would you?'

'Hullo! Come to enjoy the party too? Well, my friends and I think it could use a little more excitement!

'We wanted to decorate the tables with smelly flowers, but everyone always has their eyes on us. On account of our previous \qmisdeeds\q, I'd wager. But I'm sure you're an upstanding [placeholder]! No need to worry about people spying on you.

'The two tables you'll be looking for have empty vases. Just watch out for Caltha Goodchild's helpers. They've got the eyes of hawks.

'Grab some flowers from my basket when you're ready!'
success text
